mapper.insert: INSERT INTO funding(funding_code, id, start_date, exp_date, delivery_date, status_code) VALUES(null, #{id}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), 10);
mapper.select: SELECT f.funding_code, id, title, start_date, exp_date, target_amount, cml_amount, introduction, fmi.name AS file_name, size, location, t.tag_code, t.name AS tag_name FROM funding f, funding_main_image fmi, funding_tag ft, tag t WHERE f.funding_code = fmi.funding_code AND f.funding_code = ft.funding_code AND ft.tag_code = t.tag_code AND status_code = 40 ORDER BY funding_code DESC;
